sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Remove "Prevent Duplicate Form Headers" business rule, so users can enter a header record for the same table and instead return the lowest order record of the same table.</description> <name>Remove Prevent Duplicate Form Headers</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_script'); if(gr.get('2e032b770f2333002a001271ff767e4b')){ gr.deleteRecord(); } ]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-06-12 00:58:14</sys_created_on> <sys_id>ba69c3d253111010ac9bddeeff7b126f</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Remove Prevent Duplicate Form Headers</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Agent Workspace - Form" source="com.snc.agent_workspace.form">b7ea78203c35311068bcf327dfe37f54</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_ba69c3d253111010ac9bddeeff7b126f</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-06-12 00:58:14</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
